mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Customer (name, birthday, gender) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id as customer_id ,c.name as customer_name ,c.birthday as customer_birthday ,c.gender as customer_gender ,t.id as ticket_id ,t.payment_code as ticket_payment_code ,t.name as ticket_name ,t.remaining as ticket_remaining ,t.start_date as ticket_start_date ,t.limit_date as ticket_limit_date ,h.id as history_id ,h.customer_id as history_customer_id ,h.ticket_Id as history_ticket_Id ,h.store_Id as history_store_Id ,h.use_date as history_use_date ,h.staff_Id as history_staff_Id FROM Customer c LEFT JOIN Ticket t ON t.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN History h ON h.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
